latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

fields.value: Preliminary Survey - Anatomy of Peasant Economy

dsDescriptionValue.value: To describe the major socio-economic characteristics of a typical rice village in Southern Luzon through a complete enumeration survey of the village.   This is a benchmark survey for the integrated farm household record-keeping project, titled "Anatomy of Peasant Economy".

keywordValue.value: Household member characteristics (age, sex, education, occupation); household income by source; input and output of rice production, land area, tenure status, farm assets.

fields.value: Subject: Number of Repondents  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 95;
